notificationList.commandLine: tail -f /Applications/Hearthstone/Logs/Power.log | grep -A1 --line-buffered 'TAG_CHANGE Entity=GameEntity tag=STEP value=MAIN_READY' | grep -E --line-buffered 'BLOCK_START BlockType=TRIGGER Entity=(.*) EffectCardId= EffectIndex=1 Target=0' | sed -l 's/.*Entity=//g; s/ EffectCardId=.*//g'
tail -f /Applications/Hearthstone/Logs/Power.log | grep --line-buffered ' tag=PLAYSTATE value=CONCEDED' | sed -l 's/.*Entity=//g; s/tag=PLAYSTATE.*//g'

tail -f /Applications/Hearthstone/Logs/Power.log | grep --line-buffered 'TAG_CHANGE Entity=.* tag=PLAYER_ID value=' | grep --line-buffered GameState | sed -l 's/.*Entity=//g; s/tag=PLAYER_ID.*//g' | tr -u '
' ' '
notificationList.notifContent: Queue finished. Game is now starting

notificationList.commandLine: tail -f /Applications/Hearthstone/Logs/Power.log | grep --line-buffered ' tag=PLAYSTATE value=WON' | grep --line-buffered GameState | sed -l 's/.*Entity=//g; s/tag=PLAYSTATE.*//g'
